example_sentence_en: To reach the museum
related_words_it: Per raggiungere il museo devi girare a sinistra.

example_sentence_en: I turn right at the traffic light.
I turned too early yesterday.
Turning here you’ll see the river.

definition_en: move from one place to another
example_sentence_en: You can go straight for two blocks.
example_sentence_it: Puoi andare dritto per due isolati.

example_sentence_en: I go to the station every day.
I went by foot last night.
example_sentence_it: Sono andato a piedi ieri sera.

example_sentence_en: Going straight you’ll reach the sea.
example_sentence_it: Andando sempre dritto arrivi al mare.

example_sentence_en: Continue until you see the arch.
I continue along this street.
I continued after the bridge.
Continuing you’ll reach the piazza.

definition_en: go from one side to other
example_sentence_en: Cross the street at the zebra crossing.
I cross the square every morning.
I crossed the bridge yesterday.
Crossing the park you’ll save time.
Remember to stop at the sign.
I stop in front of the church.
I stopped here last time.
example_sentence_it: Mi sono fermato qui l'ultima volta.

example_sentence_en: Stopping often lets you rest.
Please follow the main road.
example_sentence_it: Per favore segui la strada principale.

example_sentence_en: I follow the map carefully.
I followed your instructions.
Following the river you’ll find the mill.
example_sentence_it: Seguendo il fiume trovi il mulino.

example_sentence_en: Pass the tower and turn right.
example_sentence_it: Oltrepassa la torre e gira a destra.

example_sentence_en: I pass the pharmacy every day.
I passed the square yesterday.
Passing the park you’ll see the lake.
example_sentence_it: Oltrepassando il parco vedrai il lago.

example_sentence_en: Enter through the side door.
I enter the museum at ten.
I entered the station quickly.
example_sentence_it: Sono entrato in stazione in fretta.

example_sentence_en: Entering you’ll see the ticket desk.
Exit at the next stop.
I exit the metro here.
I exited on the wrong side.
Exiting you’ll find the taxi rank.
We need to look for the sign.
I look for the right street.
I looked for the hotel yesterday.
Looking for the church we got lost.
example_sentence_it: Cercando la chiesa ci siamo persi.
